description:
The rugged Workwear Ranger Denim Jacket is for those who go above and beyond the job. Crafted with hardworking individuals in mind, this jacket combines durability, functionality, and a touch of style.

The 12 oz denim fabric is a robust blend of 71 % cotton, 25 % recycled polyester, 2,5 % rayon and 1,5 % spandex. It withstands the toughest tasks while offering flexibility and comfort. The inside lining is made of heavyweight flannel, providing extra warmth on chilly workdays. Designed for enhanced mobility, the bi-swing back allows for freedom of movement, making it perfect for active work environments.Equipped with two flapped pockets, four hand warmer pockets, and an interior pocket, this jacket offers ample storage space for tools and personal belongings.

Elevate your workwear wardrobe with our Workwear Denim Jacket, a testament to those who work hard and demand rugged garments without compromising style. Stand out with this durable and stylish piece of workwear.
name: Hooke Ranger Denim Work Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 12 oz denim made of 71% cotton, 25% recycled polyester, 2,5% rayon and 1,5% spandex
